QuestData.Title: Ingra Drif
QuestData.Description:
Ingra Drif, the Drust captain, has been spotted inside Darkreach. This is our chance to destroy him for good.
I know him and his cruelty all too well, $n. Whatever you do to him, it's better than what he deserves.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Ingra Drif enslaved fae and turned them against their own kind. Now is the time to end him.
QuestData.RewardText:
Good. The Drust have been dealt a significant blow.
The spirits of those lost to Ingra Drif's treachery can at last be at peace.
